source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of modern, multi-story residential buildings constructed along a canal. The buildings feature a variety of architectural styles, colors, and balconies. Several small boats are moored in the water directly in front of the homes.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenery shot of modern, multi-story residential buildings constructed along a canal. The buildings feature a variety of architectural styles, colors, and balconies. Several small boats are moored in the water directly in front of the homes.

bad_caption: A group of cyclists rides in single file along a winding mountain road, passing by dense forests and rocky cliffs. In the background, a herd of deer crosses a shallow stream, pausing briefly before continuing into the trees. The cyclists slow down as they approach a sharp bend, maintaining their formation throughout the scene.
